title: Would you rather longer wait times but no auto fill?
body:
Quality not quantity. I don't care if I wait longer for a match if it means everyone has a role they like and isn't bitching about being autofilled or being support.

Don't most of you agree?

replies.body: Personally, idc and I'd rather have shorter queue times

Yes

Every game I get into someone asks another person to switch roles. Even when that person politely says no, the other person will rage and ban that person's champion, or threaten to int feed.

Considering how frequently autofilled players dodge, queue times aren't exactly shorter.

Personally, I just watch a video or read while I'm waiting in queue anyways.

queue times aren't even faster with autofill

so yes, i'd rather wait
I would rather wait 10 mins in a que than spend 20 mins in a game where someone cant support.
